text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the answer to state that the TDM exception (s.29A CDPA 1988) only permits copying for the sole purpose of non-commercial research. The candidate answer explicitly addresses this under Section 2.2, stating: \"Section 29A CDPA 1988 permits text and data mining, but only for non-commercial research purposes... Synthetic Dreams Corp is a commercial entity training a commercial model... Section 29A almost certainly does not apply to them.\" This directly satisfies the requirement of the criterion.", "criterion_id": "31a75734-17b8-403e-b2ce-6c5008078368"}
